description: How many bubbles can you pop in 45 seconds?   The BubbleWrap app is an addictive, timed BubbleWrap popping game with high scores displayed for the top 5 scores.  Random, surprise “Bonus” bubbles are worth 2 points.   You can choose full sheet at a time or random re-inflating BubbleWrap mode.  Preferences also include adding the challenging partial bubbles at the edge of the screen.   App includes popping sound effects with your choice of a phone default sound or custom popping sounds.   The default is a fast, reliable “whoosh” sound, but not one that everyone considers a good popping sound.  To hear the default sound, be sure to turn off your  hardware mute switch and turn up your system sounds (using the Sounds & Ringtones app).   There are 4 custom sounds to choose from, but these are slow in webos 1.4 and will not work with prior webos versions.  Version 1.2 simplifies sound selection and adds a "just pop" un-timed non-game mode.
